Mothership Documentation

Documentation for Mothership.app

Get Started →

Syncronize your environments

Sync your local development environment with any backup from production, staging, or other environment in seconds.

Scheduled backups

Sleep with ease knowing your application is being backed up daily, weekly, monthly and even yearly at regular intervals.

Healthy sites are productive sites

With error log tracking and Mothership healthchecks you no longer have to comb your application for errors.
